div.p: From 12 o’clock until 9 o’clock I’m in a warehouse taking photos of the beverages and then from 9 o’clock until 1 o’clock I’m editing
I’m editing photos from weekend photo shoots of christenings, weddings or anything like that and I’m very thankful that my manager
is lenient in the fact that I can book a day off in the week if I was to have a photo shoot in those hours but I do try and squeeze
it outside that night 12-9. How do I find night shifts? I’m OK, I don’t like waking up in the morning, I hate waking up in the morning
so I get my sleep so I’m fine with night shift, it kind of works.
